subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Raffi Torres ended an ugly Stanley Cup finals opener with a dramatic flash, scoring the games only goal with 18.5 seconds left to play to give Vancouver a 1-0 series lead.
snippet: Raffi Torres ended an ugly Stanley Cup finals opener with a dramatic flash, scoring the games only goal with 18.5 seconds left to play to give Vancouver a 1-0 series lead.
